note: Regional aggregates were calculated by Our World in Data and are based on those specified by the [OECD](#dod:oecd-regions).
title: Projections of plastic waste by disposal method
subtitle: Mismanaged plastic waste is plastic that is either littered or [inadequately disposed](#dod:inadequatelymanagedwaste).  A country's total does not include waste that is exported overseas, where it may be mismanaged. Based on the "business-as-usual" scenario which assumes that current policies remain unchanged in the foreseeable future.
